description:
Renner Theiere Chardelon Ryle Vaiself is the Third Princess of the Kingdom. She is publicly known as the Golden Princess due to her great beauty, benevolence and kindness as well as being a reformer who brought positive changes to the Kingdom. However, in reality she has a psychopathic personality and does not care about the feelings of others. The only exception to this is http://anidb.net/ch92890 [Climb] towards who she harbours a demanded love, viewing him as her "puppy". She merely maintains this facade in order to maintain her good reputation.
Her love towards Climb emerged from that fact that her mental capacities were overdeveloped, causing no one to truly understood her until she saved him and he began to hold onto her every word. Initially, she merely influenced events behind the scenes to increase Climb`s reputation.
name: Renner Theiere Chardelon Ryle Vaiself
